rules_text:
Mirrormeld Spire has all abilities of land cards integrated onto permanents you control.
{T}: Add {C}.
{C}, {T}: Integrate the top card of target player’s library. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
notes:
!canoncard Urza’s Mine
 101: Integrating is now optional.
!landslot
